name: OWLTrac
short_description:
This project has been put together to help make use of The Owl Intuition-e API from 2 Save Energy.  It is  a Windows Service which receives UDP Unicast Packets from The Owl, and then can write out the data in either XML or CSV.  

This product also incorporates Schneider Electric's StruxureWare as an Endpoint for setting values, logging and reporting.

The project is written in C# using the .NET Framework and will work on any Microsoft Operating System that supports .NET 4.5.1 (Namely Windows 7 or greater).

The code is easily manipulated using Visual Studio 2013.  The Installer is built using InstallShield LE, which is also available for download.

As it stands only a single Owl Intuition-E Single Phase Monitoring applications.  Further support will be added later.
summary: OWLTrac for Owl Intuition-e metering products
